name: Frida Baby NoseFrida Saline Mist Spray, Baby Saline Nasal Spray Decongestant for Allergy Relief and Congestion Relief to Soften Nasal Passages, 0.68 fl oz
short_description: GENTLE, NON-MEDICATED CONGESTION RELIEF: The Frida Baby Saline Mist Spray provides safe, drug-free relief for baby congestion by effectively loosening thick, stubborn boogers and moisturizing dry nasal passages. It’s ideal for babies suffering from allergies, colds, or dry environments.

2-IN-1 VERSATILE APPLICATION FOR ALL AGES: Designed with a unique applicator, the spray can be used upright as a fine mist or upside down as a gentle dropper, making it easy to administer saline to tiny, sensitive noses. The small, ergonomic tip is specially crafted for newborns and infants.

CLEAN, NATURAL FORMULA FOR PEACE OF MIND: Made from just salt and water, this saline spray contains no alcohol, medication, or artificial additives, ensuring it’s gentle enough for everyday use on the most sensitive skin and nasal tissues.

PREPARES FOR EFFECTIVE ASPIRATION: Use the saline spray as a pre-treatment before using the NoseFrida Nasal Aspirator. The mist softens mucus and preps the nasal passages, making snot removal quicker and more effective for both parent and baby.
TRUSTED BY PARENTS & PEDIATRICIANS: Frida Baby’s commitment to safe, effective, and parent-friendly solutions makes this saline spray an essential addition to your baby health and wellness kit.
product_description: Product Description Booger freedom starts with NoseFrida Saline Mist! Made with only water and salt, this gentle saline nasal spray is perfect for loosening snot and nasal congestion in baby's nose for the best sucking results! Recommended to use before NoseFrida the SnotSucker, this spray acts like a quick neti pot burst to soften boogers in baby's nasal passages. Brand Story FROM DELIVERY TO BOOGERS, BUTTS AND BEYOND! Frida is the brand that gets parents. That means you. We are not a lifestyle. Far from it. We are a solution-based brand. The 411 of parenting. The who-do-I-call-in-the-middle-of-the-night-cause-my-baby-won't-stop-screaming brand.

name: Momcozy BreezyClear™ 2-in-1 Electric Nasal Aspirator for Baby with Spray, 65kPa Hospital-Grade Suction, 4 Adjustable Levels, Quiet & Portable Nose Cleaner with Soothing Light & Music
short_description: 【UPGRADED 2-IN-1 SPRAY & SUCTION FOR INSTANT NOSE RELIEF】---Combining a precision-fit nasal mask with a fine mist spray, Momcozy 2-in-1 Electric Nasal Aspirator quickly softens stubborn mucus, making it easier to clear. Paired with a powerful 65KPa hospital-grade suction, it gently but effectively removes congestion, restoring your baby’s nasal comfort in seconds. No more stuffy noses—just easy breathing!

【SAFE & GENTLE WITH SMART PROTECTION】---Designed with material and functional safety in mind, Momcozy 2-in-1 Electric Nasal Aspirator features an auto shut-off mist function after 6 seconds to prevent over-moisturization and reduce the risk of nasal discomfort. With four adjustable suction levels, parents can customize the intensity to suit their baby’s needs, ensuring effective mucus removal without irritation. Made from BPA-free silicone and FDA-cleared, it provides hospital-grade safety, giving moms peace of mind.

【FEWER PARTS, HASSLE-FREE CLEANING】---Featured only two detachable parts for quick and easy cleaning—no complicated assembly, no hidden buildup. A cleaner nasal aspirator means a healthier breathing environment for your baby, ensuring hygienic nasal care with minimal effort.

【WHISPER-QUIET FOR PEACEFUL NIGHTS】---Operating at just 43 dB, Momcozy 2-in-1 Electric Nasal Aspirator is ultra-quiet, allowing parents to clear their baby’s nose even while they sleep—no loud noise, no sudden wake-ups, just uninterrupted rest for both baby and parents.

【FUN & ENGAGING FOR STRESS-FREE USE】---Soft lights and cheerful music turn nasal care into an enjoyable experience, capturing your baby’s attention and making the process easier for parents. While your little one stays engaged, you can clear their nose quickly—no more fuss, just happy, easy breathing.

【CLEANING METHOD】: ①Disassemble---Unscrew the collection cup from the unit, remove the silicone tip and the internal rubber seal, rinse them under running water or wash with mild & non-abrasive soap. ②Stay Assembled---Place the machine horizontally under the faucet, rinse the silicone head with running water, and the dirty water will flow out from the water outlet on the side of the machine(please watch the video for more information). WARNING: Do not clean the main unit under running water after unscrewing the collection cup, otherwise, it will cause a short circuit in the machine.

short_description: 【Waterproof & Easy-to-Clean 】 Bivni Baby Nasal Aspirator KA1005, electric nose suction for baby is IPX7 waterproof (wash directly in water) and features a quick self-cleaning system. If nasal gets inside the machine, remove the nasal reservoir, then use a cup or sink to draw water into the device and run it for about 1 to 3 minutes to flush the inside, and drain the water from the drain to flush out the mucus.

【Safety & Comfortable 】 The nasal aspirator is designed for newborns, toddlers, and children and is equipped with 3 Food-grade silicone tips. BPA-free, soft, and non-irritating, ensuring that it does not hurt the baby's nasal mucosa. You can choose the right suction tip for your baby to use according to the size of your baby's nose and the depth of mucus.

【3 Levels Suction & Zero Backflow 】 The suction power of the Baby Nasal Aspirator is up to 65Kpa. Long press to turn on/off, 3-speed suction mode adjustment, which can solve almost all kinds of nasal problems. Also features an anti-backflow design with a one-way air inlet that prevents mucus from backflowing, protecting your baby’s nasal cavity. (For stubborn mucus and mucus, suggest softening it with a saline spray first, wait one minute, then use this baby nasal aspirator)

【Comfortable Music & Light 】 The baby nose sucker has pleasant music and soothing light effects, which can well distract your baby and let him enjoy the comfortable cleaning function. This tool is a must-have for every new parent's kit.

【Rechargeable & Portable 】 This mucus suction cup is equipped with a long-lasting rechargeable battery that can be used for 120 minutes on a full charge and is perfect for on-the-go relief. It also includes a convenient storage box, making it easy for parents to carry around. Suitable as a Mother's Day gift.(NOTE: The nasal aspirator will not operate while charging.)
